Name: Neem & Salicylic Acid Face Wash - 100ml

Formulated with a blend of botanicals & actives, this face wash gently cleanses & exfoliates without making your skin dry. So, redness or irritationÖlet those be the side characters that couldn't get the limelight. And what about the main villain, acne? Weíve got you covered! Infused with antibacterial & anti-inflammatory properties, Neem inhibits the growth of acne-causing bacteria and prevents the formation of future breakouts. Salicylic Acid, a renowned acne-fighting active, penetrates deep into your pores to exfoliate and eliminate excess oil, leaving you with clear and oil-free skin. And who doesnít love a happy ending? With every splash, Hyaluronic Acid, the hydration booster deeply moisturizes & enhances skin elasticity, making it soft & smooth.

Product 1: Acne & Blemish Control: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) is proven to target spots, soothe acne, regulate sebum production & increase the resiliency of skin barrier (outer surface of skin).

Product 3: ALL-DAY, NON-GREASY MOISTURIZATION: The unique specialist gel formula gently hydrates the skin without stickiness, greasiness or tackiness.
Product 3: FADES BLEMISHES & BRIGHTENS SKIN: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) at 2% helps brighten skin and clear blemishes, besides helping to fade post-acne marks. Rice water in the formula helps improve skin texture while keeping it soft & supple.
